title: Very nice t210-2 Keifel for sale

posts.post_title: Very nice t210-2 Keifel for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

A solid VG-VG/EX card and should at least grade out as a "40" if not higher.  No wrinkling and only mild touches to the corners.  There does appear to be a printer's line running vertically on the card as well.  It shows up in the scan so I wanted people to know that's not a scratch or a crease.  Asking $60 delivered.

Thanks in advance,
Brian

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1216249653.JPG[/IMG]
